name: MLK Trading Season 5 - $2,500 MLK Rewards
description:
Weâ€™re excited to launch a 30-day trading volume event starting Feb 12 (UTC) with a total reward pool of $2,500 in MLK!

ğŸ”‘ Event Details
-	Daily Rewards: $83 in MLK distributed each day
-	Eligibility: Top 10 wallets with at least $15,000 daily trading volume on PancakeSwap V3
-	Daily Reward per Wallet: Approx. $8.3 in MLK

 ğŸ“Œ Rules
- If more than 10 wallets qualify on a given day, 10 winners will be randomly selected from eligible participants.
- Only wallets submitted before the deadline will be considered.
- Each wallet can claim rewards up to 2 times during the entire event (anti-monopoly rule).
- All trades must be executed directly on PancakeSwap V3.
- All rewards will be distributed to Arbitrum chain
- Raffle results within Galxe are not related to the actual event winners. Rewards will only be granted to wallets that meet the trading requirements and are selected through the daily draw.

For eligible wallets, rewards will be distributed within two weeks after the event ends.

â° Event Period : Feb 12 ~ Mar 14 (UTC)

name: CHECKPOINT MOMENTUM
description:
### New year. New momentum. Bigger rewards.
#### Kick off the Lunar New Year with Checkpoint Momentum, where progress doesnâ€™t reset, it compounds (à¹‘ËƒÌµá´—Ë‚Ìµ)Ùˆ ï¾–ï½¼!


Build momentum throughout the campaign and unlock some of the biggest rewards weâ€™ve offered, designed to keep you moving into the new year and help with your points checking and tracking journey!

Checkpoint Exchange is galloping towards testnet, but you may wonder, what is Checkpoint?

Glad you asked. **Checkpoint** is a project where you can easily check and track your points. Paste any EVM addy or name and it resolves to points. Simple.

You can do lots of other things with Checkpoint as well; build apps, integrate projects and much more. BUT the most exciting part is trading points soon, from offchain to onchain, pretty neat huh?! (ã€ƒï¿£ï¸¶ï¿£)äºº(ï¿£ï¸¶ï¿£ã€ƒ)

Learn more about Checkpoint with our  [docs](https://docs.checkpoint.exchange) OR check our [web app](https://checkpoint.exchange/?ref=galxe). 

---

#### About CHECKPOINT MOMENTUM

This series of quests is not sequential, jump in anytime and take your shot at earning some sweet rewards. Better yet, rewards are guaranteed and claims are gas free. Momentum quests will end on February 28th or earlier, with claims open after.

With varying levels of difficulty, tasks, and entry requirements, thereâ€™s something for everyone to build momentum along the way.

Have fun, GLHF, and Happy Lunar New Year  |^o^/!

name: Ride the Year of the Horse with Cartesi
description:
As we welcome the Year of the Horse, a symbol of speed, vitality, and unbridled power, Cartesi is charging into 2026 with a mission to unleash the true potential of Web3.

Cartesi allows developers to build appchain rollups with any code, while benefiting from Ethereum's security. By bringing the full Linux runtime to blockchain, we empower you to build with the languages, libraries, and tools you already love.

To celebrate this spirit of innovation and prosperity, we are distributing Real Token Rewards in our exclusive Red Packet Gala.

Complete the tasks below to prove your loyalty, explore the power of Cartesi Rollups, and grab your share of the CTSI prosperity pool!

name: Mahjong Stars: A Quest for $TILE
description:
**Mahjong Stars is launching soon.**

Complete the quest to get early access and earn $TILE before the public release.
Connect your wallet, follow the steps, and be ready for launch. Early players get the best rewards.

**$TILE** is our onchain token - it gives discounts on Star Points, unlocks premium matches and events, lets you buy NFTs, and earns staking rewards.
Star Points are the in-game (off chain) currency you use to play matches, place bets, earn rewards, and cash out through NFTs.

At the end, top players secure IRL Gold Tile collectibles - real physical Mahjong tiles made with real gold accents from our limited 144-piece set.
